did.unittitle: Medicinal recipe book (collection to be reasessed)
did.abstract: One bound book, with several loose pages, containing handwritten notes on recipes for various medicinal formulas. Veterinary medical formulas are also included. The compiler of the notes is unknown, but the book contains an inscription indicating that its contents were copied from "T. Clifford's Farriery, Blackdown Mill." It is assumed that this inscription refers to Blackdown Mill in East Sussex, England.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
